title: Gamification-Based Program for Enhancing Online Discussion Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform usage and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: A gamified process conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, enabling learners to maintain continuous engagement in discussion forums

learning_goals: Learners post meaningful contributions at least three times per week in 4-week online discussions
Learners maintain discussion participation motivation above 80% by utilizing gamification elements (goal-access-feedback-challenge-collaboration-illusion)
Learners enhance the quality of discussion participation by 20% through peer assessment and feedback systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
